name: Krishna Shalawadi
summary: Enthusiastic and goal-driven Information Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in software development and machine learning applications. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, web development, and demonstrating leadership as a project lead in academic research.
education: M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology Bangalore, India, B.E. in Information Science and Engineering, 2022 – Present
Narayana PU College Bangalore, Karnataka, 2nd PUC, Science (PCMC): 93.5, May 2021 – May 2022

projects.title: House Price Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a regression model using the King County dataset to predict house prices based on features like bedrooms, area, location and other factors. Applied and compared Linear, Ridge, XGBoost, Gradient Boost and Random Forest Regression algorithms using Scikit-learn; visualized model performance with metrics and plots.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Detection using Quantum Machine Learning
projects.description: Led a team of 4 to build a hybrid system combining classical ML (SVM, CNN, RF) and quantum ML (VQC, QCNN, QNN) for medical image classification. Achieved 96% accuracy using CNN; authored a comparative analysis paper on classical vs quantum models.

projects.title: DISCRETA – Discrete Mathematics Game Project
projects.description: Developed interactive learning games based on set theory and graph concepts for educational use. Built logic for the ‘Relation Game’ and visualized Warshall’s Algorithm for transitive closure.
